title: Demolition Day
description: Safely remove an obsolete table from the database using DROP TABLE.
story: The old 'temp_data' table is no longer needed and taking up space. Remove it from the database using DROP TABLE.
hint: DROP TABLE temp_data; Use this carefully - it permanently deletes the table and all its data!
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS temp_data CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE temp_data (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, test_value VARCHAR(50));
